text.section:
There is a Chief Academic Officer in the Baltimore City Public School System who shall:
Be responsible for the development and implementation of the curriculum taught and the instruction provided in the Baltimore City Public School System; and
Report directly to the Chief Executive Officer.

The Chief Executive Officer shall, subject to the approval of the board:
Select the Chief Academic Officer; and
Establish the salary of the Chief Academic Officer.

The employment contract of the Chief Academic Officer shall provide, at a minimum, that continued employment is contingent on demonstrable improvement in the academic performance of the students in the Baltimore City Public School System.
The Chief Academic Officer is not a public officer under the Constitution or the laws of the State.
